name: Pissed Off Penguins
blurb: This is an Open Source 2D Game Project using the Blender 3D Game Engine.  Angry Birds Style.

rewards.reward: You will get Early access to the project and videos files.  You will also get your name in the credits of the game as a supporter.\r\n\r\nAnd of course the game will be free (as in Freedom) to everyone when it is complete.

You will receive a POP (Pissed Off Penguins) Thank You Card.

You will get Early access to the project and videos files.  You will also get your name in the credits of the game as a supporter.

And of course the game will be free (as in Freedom) to everyone when it is complete.

You will receive a POP (Pissed Off Penguins) Stickers and a Thank You Card.
